start.title: Welcome to the <1 /> interactive <3>Morse</3> code course!
start.description: Click to log in / sign up
start.name: Name

0.description: Welcome, {{name}}! My name is <3>Meows</3>, I will be happy to help you on the course

1.description: In the profile you can see your achievements, as well as change information about yourself or the theme

2.description: I suggest you start with practice, to open the simulator, expand the panel on the left

testing.description: I see you are ready to test yourself! If you pass this section successfully, I will reward you. Your task is to solve the cipher: listen to the Morse code (each letter is separated by a small pause) and enter the decryption (letters without spaces) into the text field below
testing.winner: Congratulations, <1>{{name}}</1>, on your successful completion of the Morse code course! I award you a certificate, you can download it and print
testing.looser: Your result is {{score}}%, and to successfully pass the test, you need to score 100%. Try our simulators to prepare better and come back again!

description.0: Oops... :( You've failed this time, but I remember only your best score as I promised - {{bestScore}}! Sometimes you can try again and you will definitely succeed! But now let's try to pass next lesson :)
description.1: Congratulations, you've passed lesson {{lessonID}}. Give me a high five, you've scored {{currentScore}} points! You can pass the level again, and I will remember only your best score - {{bestScore}} :)

looser.description: The accuracy is less than 70%, you should go through the lesson {{ lessonID }} again. Don't worry, I have paws too!
